comment: Takes attendance before each class, most people leave before class is over. Boring lectures and you don't have to pay attention. Sends study guides with clear information with what'll be on the test/quiz a few days before. Extra credit opportunities. Sweet old man. Posts all powerpoints online.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--LECTURE HEAVY--Would take again

comment: Cute little old man, super understanding and patient. Has an attendance policy, but its just signing in so lots of people left before end of class. Lectures are long and boring, but he posts study guides of what will be on the test. You don't need to pay attention in class or show up to pass. Lots of extra credit opportunities: paper & powerpoints.

Easy class if you memorize the study guides before each quiz and test. There's four quizzes that make up 20% of your grade and four tests that make up the rest. Each are almost exactly like the study guides. You don't have to pay attention in class, but show up because he takes attendance. He's caring and understanding. I'd recommend him.

Very easy to make an A in this class. Lectures can be off topic or boring sometimes, but he gets everything taught. Gives out study guides before every test and quiz: use them! They have everything that will be on the test. He counts attendance but isn't strict about it. Great guy, knows his stuff. Never needed the textbook
rating_tags: GRADED BY FEW THINGS--EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria

comment: Graham is awesome, has 4 quizzes and 4 tests. lowest quiz gets dropped. Sends out a study guide before every quiz and test, if you study the study guide then youll easily pass the class.

Very nice guy. Understanding if you're ever sick. Class wasn't hard. Just memorize the study guides and you'll pass. He is sooooo boring though. All he does is read PowerPoints in a monotone voice. The problem is he takes attendance and you'll never want to come because it's so boring. If you miss more than 3 classes, he starts deducting your grade

Your grade for the class comes from 4 tests and 4 quizzes each of which he provides a fantastic study outline for. The study outline has everything you need to do well, study those and you'll be fine. He's a great professor, very knowledgeable and cares about his students.

Professor Graham is very passionate in his field, but is rather boring when it comes to his class. He gives study guides for everything so there is no need to buy the book. If you don't get an A in this class you should really start questioning why you are in college.

Professor Graham is an easy grader. The book is required but I didn't use it once over the course of the semester. 4 quizes, 4 tests. He will drop the lowest quiz grade. Usually offers and extra credit assignment. He provides study guides before every quiz or test. Just go over the study guide and pass. Easy.

He is such a nice guy, truly cares about his students. But yes it is true that he can be very boring. The whole class is only 4 quizzes and 4 exams and he gives a study guide for every single one with all answers. The book wasn't really needed don't worry about it. Take him

Prof. Graham is a very sweet man, but he is also very boring. Attendance is mandatory. He has 4 test and the last one is the "final". 4 quizzes. He gives a study guide for every quiz and test. Overall a very good professor and I would take again.

I love Professor Graham! He is adorable and makes a long lecture easier to sit through. He gives study guides for every test which are basically the test. Also, there is an optional extra credit assignment that is worth 5 whole points. I wouldn't bother buying a textbook because you hardly ever need it.

Most boring class i have ever taken. Professor Graham is the sweetest old man ever, but he has a monotone voice that is so hard to focus on. He gives study guides or every test so you dont really need to read, but it is a good idea to just in case. Gives an extra credit paper, but overall not a bad class, just very boring.

If you need your American Gov credit TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!  His lectures are long and boring, but you  don't have to listen to them because for every single test and quiz he gives you an exact study guide for the assessment.  I bought the book and didn't open it once for the course because his study guides were all i needed Lots of extra cred .
Great Teacher! He would lecture everyday but if you miss a class its not a big deal. He gives study guides for everything so as long as you go over them you will do fine.

Graham was my favorite professor so far! Though his class is long and boring, he's such a sweet man and genuinely wants his students to pass. If you study his study guides, you'll be perfect going into the class. I would recommend him to anyone. Just make sure you bring something to do during his class

ttests are impossible.  You lose points if you skip class so don't ever plan on missing even 1 class.  The class is so much more difficult than it should be.  I read every chapter and still had trouble deciphering his tests.
This teacher is so nice, however this class is so boring. Attendance is mandatory and you will never want to go. As long as you read over the study outline before tests you will pass.

Prof Graham is an amazing professor, he's the sweetest man you'll ever meet! His lectures tend to go on and on, which leads most to lose attention. But overall this is a very easy class and he's very willing and understanding when it comes to taking tests/quizes late due to illness or prior arrangement. I LOVE him!! Would def take again.
If you don't read every night, you will flunk the popp quizzes.  Tough class, tough subject, and boring.
You have to buy the book and read all of the chapters carefuly or you wont passt the class.  Lots of  material covered on each test,, which is not covered in powerpoint  notes.  Super hard.

Boring class .  Don't even think about missing one class because you will miss his notes that are not ever putm on d2l.  I would take someone else who actually uses d2l so you can look at powerpoints and notes.  This class was miserable.
His lectures are so boring and his tests are insanely hard.  He's a nice guy, but his tests are tough to pass.
His tests are so hard and do not corresmpond to the lectures/powerpoints.  I agree, he is no longer one of the better teachers.  Difficult class.  I struggled.

His class has changed.  He assigns long papers and his tests are extremely difficult.  Tests are not anything likem notes.  Take someone else.  This is the most difficult class I have taken at Kennesaw in 2 years.
TAKE HIM!! He is a great professor and is very clear in class. He also gives great study guides before tests and quizzes. Seriously y'all you would regret taking his class.
He makes the course easy and gives extra credit opportunities, but be sure to still study and not rely on extra credit.
Great teacher!! I hated government in high school and he made me get a better understanding of it! Test and quizzes are easy if you study the study guide it gives you!! Take him you won't regret it!

Such a kind, sweet old man. He really loves his subject (although I found it rather boring) and his lectures are long. Posts PPTs on D2L and gives study guides for tests and quizzes. TESTS AND QUIZZES ARE EXACTLY FROM THE STUDY GUIDE. I haven't opened my book once! He is so helpful and offers extra credit often. Easy A and so very nice. Take him!!

Great teacher for this course. Clear in what he wants, very helpful, and wants students to pass. Gives study handouts for quizzes and tests (4 each 8 total). Extra credit is given. READ the book. You need to read in order to get an A or B because the study guide is only 70% of the test and quizzes. You'll do great if you read. Very easy otherwise.

Easy AB course. Lectures are longboring. Honestly you can skip class and be fine because his quizzes and tests are from his study guide that he completely quizzes and tests are taken straight from the study guide that he fills out for you. All you have to do is study the study guide. Gave an optional Extra Paper. 4 tests4 Quizzes! Don't buy book

Prof. Graham is a very kind man--there is no denying that. Sure, his lectures are long and boring, but the subject isn't fascinating to most. His quizzes and tests are taken straight from the study guide, but I did use the book occasionally as a second reference. He gave us an optional extra credit paper. Would definitely recommend.

Nice man. Goes out of his way to help you. Lectures are so boring. I didn't buy the book. He sends study guides before each test and quiz and that's all you need to pass. A on every quiz, B on every test. I only went to class on test dates. Offers extra credit, but it was a complicated essay so I didn't do it. As easy as a high school Civics class

He is a really nice guy, really enjoys teaching. His class is easy, you cant miss more than 2 days. He is boring, but gives study guides for everything which really help. I never have used the book and I have made A's on everything. Being in class helps, but it isnt necessary to do well on tests and quizzes.
Mr. Graham enjoys what he teaches, but he is easily the most boring teacher I have ever had. Attendance isn't mandatory, so study the study guide, and you should get an A.
Very easy class.  Great professor, he will cover everything on the test, not just once.  If government isn't your forte, you will need the textbook.  I definitely recommend.
While not the most interesting professor to listen to, Professor Graham is a sweetheart who loves his subject. His tests are very easy, and his lectures are informative if not exciting.

The class is pretty easy- you get study guides for each test, extra credit opportunities etc. If you are looking for an upbeat class with discussion you will not find it here. He is very boring. Very by the book. Its hard to stay awake in class. He's pretty understanding about sickness/absences if you email him in advanced. Book is necessary!!

Great, nice Guy! He Loves what he does. Boring as a potato. I recommend you sit in the front of his class because its hard to hear him sometimes. 4 Test If you study the study guide you should do fine. Has pop quizzes to check for attendance.

I am still taking this class but it has been very easy. He only goes over power points in each class and puts them all online. I am not very good at history or anything but I haven't made below an 86 on any quiz or exam. 5-6 random quizzes and 3 exams with a final. I would recommend this class/professor.
